documents.document: @Fun_Beard have you called your senators? or are you just sitting back and doing nothing? because spoiler alert: she might not get confirmed
@IndivisibleTeam @UC_Indivisible @IndivisibleCin @indivisiblecbus @IndivisibleOhio Hey @MklaEames call him if you are free!!!
@jiatolentino @samfbiddle what did this say???
This is awesome! I've been trying to find a website like this for the past week!!! https://t.co/vWVa3dvfC1
please be the pee pee https://t.co/gdeqy8YZtF
@gayrightswatch glad to see that you've awoken :-)
The account @gayrightswatch just came out of a two year hibernation :-/ https://t.co/FMP4zS0BTI
@usuallydecent that would be so awesome! i'm applying to jobs right now actually haha
@Jakewater I should probably quit my job. Fuck.
@betsy_rioter @j_lowd could you link me to the Lyft statement please? And yes it's awful that the Uber CEO has ties to Trump
@Newyorkist also I just want to say that I fucking hate Trump and want to do whatever I can to resist. But this Uber thing confuses me.
@Newyorkist "talk to Trump" as in "convince Trump to cancel the EO"? Wouldn't that be a good thing? Shouldn't we encourage his questions?
@Newyorkist I see. That's fucked up that he's a Trump supporter. But I thought I read that the CEO was specifically against this EO
@Newyorkist @scottbix but isn't there an argument to be made that they should provide transportation to help the protesters? Honest question
@Jakewater Also full disclosure: I work for Uber and think that they're a sketchy company. But specifically on this issue I'm just confused.
Not sure I understand the #DeleteUber movement. Did Lyft boycott JFK like how the cab drivers did? If not shouldn't we also #DeleteLyft?
@j_lowd @scottbix did lyft boycott JFK as well as the taxi cab drivers? If not aren't they as evil as uber?
@j_lowd @scottbix what I meant to ask is why boycott JFK Airport when all the protestors may need access to taxis to get to and from protest
@scottbix i'm really confused. why are the taxi's boycotting JFK when the ban has nothing to do with them? it's all about Trump's EO right?
@chrislhayes but it's only for people being detained, right? doesn't actually negate the whole EO
@ashleyfeinberg i think this article is misleading bc it only applies to people currently detained at airpots. doesn't halt whole order
I really hope @alfranken runs for president in 2020 and beats @realDonaldTrump. Being beat by a former @nbcsnl cast member would be perfect
@IndivisibleTeam is there a website out there that has prewritten emails and dialogues on a variety of topics?

My New Years Resolution is to study French every week in 2017 for at least two hours, plus another language (swahili? russian? not sure yet)
@Jakewater I am really proud of myself. This was a huge success!

How am I going to survive 2017 without @BreakingNews there to alert me about all the inevitable calamities? Really sad to see the app go.
